The NIMBLE development team is hiring for a one-year programmer position. We are looking for someone with R and C++ experience. There is also a possibility of a part-time position. The deadline for full consideration is February 12. Application information is here: [https://aprecruit.berkeley.edu/JPF02822](https://aprecruit.berkeley.edu/JPF02822).
